testcase.name: Registration with a valid email exists before
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the registration page...................................passed When The user enter a valid email exists before "s.mahallel99@gmail.com"....passed And The user enter a valid password in registration page "12345678S".......passed And The user enter a valid retypepassword in registration page "12345678S"..passed And The user click on register button.......................................passed Then The system appear an error message in registration page under email "The email has already been taken.".passed

testcase.name: Enter differnt password from retype password
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the registration page...................................passed When The user enter a valid username in registration page "s.mahallel99@gmail.comb".passed And The user enter a valid password in registration page "123456789".......passed And The user enter a valid retypepassword in registration page "12345678S"..passed And The user click on register button.......................................passed Then The system appear an error message in registration page under password "The password confirmation does not match.".passed
